snippet: The death of Crown Prince Nayef bin Abdul Aziz al-Saud reopens the question of succession in this crucial American ally and oil powerhouse for the second time in less than a year.
abstract: Crown Prince Nayef bin Abdul Aziz al-Saud, Saudi interior minister, dies at age 78.
lead_paragraph: The death of Crown Prince Nayef bin Abdul Aziz al-Saud reopens the question of succession in this crucial American ally and oil powerhouse for the second time in less than a year.

headline.seo: Saudi Crown Prince Nayef Dies; Led Crackdown on Al Qaeda
headline.main: Nayef bin Abdul Aziz, Saudi Crown Prince Who Led Crackdown on Al Qaeda, Dies at 78
headline.print_headline: Prince Nayef, Saudi Interior Minister, Dies at 78
